review_data.title: Bad Food
review_data.content: I must completely agree with commenter "WannabeeObjective". The food at this restaurant is not great. I had pork dish. It was just stir fried meat, not very tasty, completely dry. Small portion, expensive. Garlic rice had zero garlic taste, it was normal rice with a...More

review_data.title: Taste of home away from home
review_data.content: Nobody can compete with Mom's cooking. Having said that, Pinatubo definitely offers a nice alternative, especially if one doesn't feel like making Lechon kawali at home or having to steam one's own Leche Flan for hours. It's true that the prices are not cheap; but...More

review_data.title: The best resto in town, Their sisig is heaven!!
review_data.content: For a traditional Filipino meal experience, Pinatubo Restaurant is the place to visit in zurich. The place did not dissapoint me. We were welcomed by the friendly staff (julius and kim) the chief cook it’s so friendly and very welcoming. He even check on us...More

review_data.title: Too pricey for small portions with no “yum” factor
review_data.content: We’ve refrained at times from writing negative reviews, but we feel obligated to say our piece. The two dishes we ordered didn’t taste anything special at all (very basic) — it was a disappointment. Based on our cooking abilities, taste buds and previous hospitality industry...More
